body_html: There's a PR somewhere adding in-kernel sendfile copy support I spent a lot of time helping to review a while back. I don't know what the status of that is, but I hope the author is generous enough to bring it to completion, because it'd be a great notch in his belt because this isn't an easy problem to solve.
